scripts.build: vite build && yarn firefox && yarn chrome
scripts.firefox: rm -rf ./firefox-extension && mkdir ./firefox-extension && cp -r ./dist/* ./firefox-extension/ && cp -r ./extension-helper/images ./firefox-extension/ && cp ./extension-helper/firefox-background.js ./firefox-extension/background.js && cp ./extension-helper/firefox-manifest.json ./firefox-extension/manifest.json && echo $(jq .version=$(jq .version package.json) extension-helper/chrome-manifest.json) > extension-helper/chrome-manifest.json
scripts.chrome: rm -rf ./chrome-extension && mkdir ./chrome-extension && cp -r ./dist/* ./chrome-extension/ && cp -r ./extension-helper/images ./chrome-extension/ && cp ./extension-helper/chrome-background.js ./chrome-extension/background.js && cp ./extension-helper/chrome-manifest.json ./chrome-extension/manifest.json && echo $(jq .version=$(jq .version package.json) extension-helper/firefox-manifest.json) > extension-helper/firefox-manifest.json
